feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
